Unseen Hunter's Pounce [Attack Technique.name: Unseen Hunter's Pounce [Attack Technique]
Unseen Hunter's Pounce [Attack Technique.flavor: Darting from the shadows, you strike your foe hard as your power twists its mind and clouds its senses.
Unseen Hunter's Pounce [Attack Technique.onHit: 2d10 + Dexterity modifier damage, and you are invisible to the target until the end of your next turn. If you use a weapon other than your monk unarmed strike to make this attack, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Unseen Hunter's Pounce [Attack Technique.effect: You have concealment until the end of your next turn, and you shift your speed. At the end of this movement, you can make a Stealth check to hide.

Unseen Ambush.name: Unseen Ambush
Unseen Ambush.flavor: You slip through space to cut down a foe with a crippling attack, then step away to vanish in the shadows.
Unseen Ambush.effect: After the attack, you teleport your speed. If you teleport to a square that grants you concealment or cover, you can make a Stealth check to hide.
Unseen Ambush.attack: Dexterity vs. Reflex. If you use a weapon other than your monk unarmed strike to make this attack, you gain combat advantage for the attack.
Unseen Ambush.onHit: 3d6 + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is stunned and gains vulnerable 10 to your attacks (save ends).

Unseen Scrutiny.name: Unseen Scrutiny
Unseen Scrutiny.flavor: You erase yourself from a foeâ€™s mind, invisibly shadowing its movements.
Unseen Scrutiny.target: One creature you are hidden from
Unseen Scrutiny.effect: You are invisible to the target until you attack it or until the end of the encounter. While this invisibility lasts, whenever the target moves, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier as an immediate reaction.
